Docs.summary: Runs through authorization UI with a browser.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Uri> AuthenticateAsync (Uri startUrl, Uri stopUrlPrefix);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Uri> AuthenticateAsync(class System.Uri startUrl, class System.Uri stopUrlPrefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The URL of the page to load in the browser.
The stop URL minus any query parameters.
Docs.summary: Runs through authorization UI with a browser for the given URL.
Docs.returns: The URL of the success page.
Docs.exception: Thrown if the user cancels the flow by pressing the back button or closing the browser window.
